events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the engineering cluster based on their experience and skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate further steps in the recruitment process.
Initial screening interview completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong competencies in software development.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to the invitation for the technical interview and confirmed their availability.
A technical interview has been scheduled to evaluate the candidate's skills on the upcoming Tuesday morning.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent coding skills and problem-solving ability.
An HR interview has been planned to discuss the candidateâ€™s workplace expectations and company culture fit.
The HR interview was conducted; the candidate showed great alignment with company values and expectations.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, including competitive salary and benefits tailored to their experience.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and agreed to start onboarding on the proposed start date.
The onboarding process has begun with the new software engineer joining the team and completing introductory trainings.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering department.
